objects.text: Authentic 925 Silver • Gift for Her • 6 Month Warranty
GIVA • Premium Jewelry • Certificate of Authenticity

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a soft and elegant design aesthetic tailored for highlighting premium jewelry. The background is a radial gradient blend from light pink (#fff0f5) to rose blush (#ffd1dc), adorned with subtle abstract wave-like patterns and geometric forms in faint mauve tones. The heading text layer (`heading`) is bold and centered at the top, using a deep wine red hue to draw immediate attention. Below it, the `subheading` introduces the product in a refined serif font. The central focus is an image element (`product_image`) displaying a pair of rose gold and silver stud earrings.

Supporting text elements like `description`, `price`, and `tagline` offer details about material, gifting suggestions, value, and more — varying in font weights and shades of rose and burgundy for visual hierarchy. A bold call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) sits prominently at the bottom with white uppercase text against a dark maroon background. Brand assurance is provided subtly with the `brand_info` text.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Pink: #fff0f5
- Rose Blush: #ffd1dc
- Mauve/Accent: #e0a0a0
- Deep Wine Red: #78181e
- Soft Plum: #b36b6f
- White: #ffffff
product_color: The product image displays a pair of elegant earrings featuring a harmonious blend of rose gold (#F4A6A6), blush pink (#F7C6C7), and brilliant white/glistening crystal (#FFFFFF). The rose gold acts as a soft and luxurious base, gracefully wrapping around each gem. Blush pink teardrop elements add a warm and feminine accent, drawing attention to the centerpiece. Sparkling white gemstones amplified with reflective highlights provide striking contrast and enhance the overall brilliance. The colors are masterfully balanced—rose gold provides warmth, blush pink adds delicacy, and white crystals highlight sparkle. This palette creates a refined and enchanting aesthetic perfect for an upscale advertisement.
